*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [8:2816]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A FORWARD -s 10.11.0.0/16 -d 10.12.0.30/32 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -s 10.11.0.10/32 -d 10.13.0.40/32 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -s 10.11.0.11/32 -d 10.12.0.30/32 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -s 10.11.0.11/32 -d 10.13.0.40/32 -j ACCEPT

# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.11 (nf_tables) on Fri Oct 31 12:02:45 2025
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:DOCKER_OUTPUT - [0:0]
:DOCKER_POSTROUTING - [0:0]
-A OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -j DOCKER_OUTPUT
-A POSTROUTING -d 127.0.0.11/32 -j DOCKER_POSTROUTING
-A DOCKER_OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j DNAT --to-destination 127.0.0.11:32771
-A DOCKER_OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j DNAT --to-destination 127.0.0.11:36649
-A DOCKER_POSTROUTING -s 127.0.0.11/32 -p tcp -m tcp --sport 32771 -j SNAT --to-source :53
-A DOCKER_POSTROUTING -s 127.0.0.11/32 -p udp -m udp --sport 36649 -j SNAT --to-source :53
COMMIT
